message.name: ERR_FUNDUSERROLE_XRV_NO_ACCESS
message.locale: %1s must be the fund owner to perform this task.

message.name: ERR_FUNDUSERROLE_FV_INVALID_ORG_OBJECT_REF_INVALID
message.locale: The organization object reference entered is invalid.
The organisation object reference entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_FUNDUSERROLE_FV_USERNAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The user name must be entered if type is 'User'.

message.name: ERR_FUNDUSERROLE_FV_ORGOBJECTREFERENCE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The organization object reference must be entered.
The organisation object reference must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FUNDUSERROLE_XFV_ORGOBJECTREFERENCE_MUST_NOT_BE_ENTERED_WHEN_USER_TYPE_IS_SELECTED
message.locale: The organization object reference must not be entered when the type 'User' is selected.
The organisation object reference must not be entered when the type 'User' is selected.

message.name: ERR_FUNDUSERROLE_XFV_USERNAME_ENTERED_WHEN_TYPE_NOT_USER
message.locale: The user name must not be entered when the type is not 'User' .
